name_en: Purchase of feed for livestock (oats, hay, bran, etc.)
Loan to consumer cooperative society
Loans secured by craft and cottage industry products
Purchase of materials for crafts, cottage industries and other industries (steel, iron, copper, wood, cloth, leather, wool, paints, etc.)
Purchase and repair of tools for crafts, cottage industries and other industries (blacksmith, carpentry tools, devices, etc.)
Loans secured by agricultural and industrial products
Repayment of private debts
Construction, purchase, equipment and repair of agricultural and industrial facilities (mills, oil mills, forges, barns, sheds, etc.)
Purchase and repair of tools for agriculture (machines, etc.)
Loan to food supply committee
Purchase of various goods for resale
Construction, purchase or repair of housing
Hiring machines and labor (workers, working livestock, electric and other energy), purchase of fuel (firewood, coal, etc.)
Improvement of lands (purchase of fertilizers, artificial irrigation, drainage, stump removal, etc.), construction of dams, ponds, gardens, vegetable gardens
Purchase of land in full ownership
Purchase of working livestock, all kinds of domestic animals (horses, oxen, donkeys, camels, cows, sheep, etc.), poultry, bees, etc.
Refinancing of issued cooperative obligations to new terms or conditions
Outfitting for migratory industries
Various personal expenses of the borrower and his family (food, heating, payment of duties, weddings, funerals, treatment, child rearing, clothing, furniture, books, etc.)
Rent (land and other lands, mills, industrial enterprises)
Purchase of seeds for sowing
